description: A comprehensive Agentic Knowledge Graph for Legal and Regulatory Compliance. This KG integrates dynamic agent generation for legal text analysis, automated contract review, and regulatory monitoring. It leverages blockchain‑audited licensing and decentralized governance to ensure immutable audit trails and secure microtransaction-based revenue sharing. The system is designed to support trusted experts in validating and refining legal agent outputs while ensuring compliance with ever-changing regulatory frameworks.

agents.name: BaseLegalAgent
agents.description: Provides foundational legal reasoning and metadata extraction from legal documents.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: RegulatoryComplianceAgent
agents.description: Analyzes regulatory texts and statutory requirements to determine compliance of contracts and practices.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: ContractAnalysisAgent
agents.description: Performs detailed analysis of contract clauses to identify potential legal risks and non‑compliance issues.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: CaseLawAnalysisAgent
agents.description: Utilizes case law databases and precedent analysis to provide context-aware legal opinions.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: DynamicCompositeLegalAgent
agents.description: Dynamically combines outputs from individual legal agents to produce a comprehensive legal opinion or analysis.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

metadata.notes: This Legal and Regulatory Compliance KG enables dynamic legal text analysis, contract review, and regulatory monitoring. It is blockchain‑audited for secure, immutable record keeping and supports decentralized governance for continuous updates by legal experts.

pricing.dynamicPricing: Based on legal complexity and usage metrics

training_examples.input: Review the following contract clause for compliance with GDPR: 'Data may be processed for marketing purposes without consent.'
training_examples.expected_output: Clause flagged as non‑compliant with GDPR.

training_examples.input: Summarize recent regulatory changes in the financial industry.
training_examples.expected_output: Summary of recent financial regulatory changes including updates to capital requirements and consumer protection measures.

evaluation_examples.input: Evaluate the legal risk of an employment contract clause that restricts non‑compete obligations for two years post‑termination.
evaluation_examples.expected_output: Balanced evaluation outlining both the enforceability issues and the need for employee mobility.

final_exam_examples.input: Provide a comprehensive legal analysis on the impact of a new privacy regulation on cross‑border data transfers.
final_exam_examples.expected_output: A detailed analysis that includes statutory interpretation, case law references, and regulatory guidelines, concluding with recommended compliance measures.
